description: This file is an HTML webpage implementing a database viewer UI with embedded JavaScript code for dynamic data fetching, table rendering, and user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading it from the API.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling object and long string expansion.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long strings or objects.
